job.title: Senior Front End Engineer

and scaling BlackLines web application and driving innovation into our product suitenbspIn this role you will research test benchmark and evaluate new technologies propose scalable solutions andnbspoptimize existing features while writing elegant code for new UInbspppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliProvide technical expertise in the design development and delivery of UIUX Components
